summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Kristen DeAnn Alderson  is an American actress and occasional singer, best known for her fifteen-year portrayal as Starr Manning on the ABC daytime soap opera One Life to Live.

title: Kristen Alderson
